img_summary: The image depicts a set of seeds displayed on a wooden tray, likely representing the "Fire Bellflower Seeds" mentioned in the preceding text. These seeds are categorized as "Uncommon" and are described as being randomly obtained from collecting a Fire Bellflower in the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. The image serves to visually represent this in-game item for a walkthrough or guide.
